pkgmetadata.longdescription:
DataTorch Python

DataTorch CLI and Python API libary for programmatic access.

```bashpip install datatorch```## Development```bashpython3 -m pip install --editable .pip3 install -r requirements.txt```### VSCode Configuration#### FormatterOpen your VSCode settings, by going `Code -> Preferences -> Settings`. Searchfor "python formatting provider" and select "black" from the dropdown menu.
